attributes.action: The UK has decided to leave the EU. Article 50 should be invoked immediately!
attributes.background: The UK has opted to leave the EU. Article 50 should be invoked immediately! The government must uphold the law & do the will of the PEOPLE. We petition government to invoke Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty before 15th July, and that Nigel Farage should be able to have a role in Divorce Negotiations.
